A true spectacle. Sarai Bespoke and @dutileyewear limited edition collaboration of 25 frames, handmade in Japan. 

Titled the “Dominion,” these expertly-crafted frames pay homage to the history of Gastown and The landmark Dominion Building, home of our SARAI BESPOKE showroom.

The color palette reflects the Dominion Building’s striking gold and burgundy exterior. The rims, bridge, hinge, and temples are gold plated and temples are covered with burgundy Japanese acetate. Lens customization is available for both sunglasses, as well as prescriptions. 
*
*
*

Timeless elegance. A Sarai Bespoke custom cocktail jacket made from red @caccioppoli1920 velvet, with a classic black satin shawl lapel. 

A velvet jacket is a truly versatile piece in every wardrobe: pair it with a classic black bowtie and white shirt for your next gala event. Or wear it with a black turtleneck for a modern, edgier look.

A finely crafted Vieux Carré cocktail on the Sarai Bespoke bar. This legendary drink, also known as the French Quarter, was first created in New Orleans in the 1930’s 🥃

As part of every Sarai Bespoke consultation and fitting, clients can enjoy a classic cocktail, mocktail, or espresso in our showroom as part of an elevated, luxury lifestyle experience tailored specifically to them.

This elevated take on the classic sneaker is the definition of versatile: wear them with a suit, denim, or chinos to complete the perfect relaxed, yet refined, look.

The return of the hat. We are honoured to continue our partnership with master hatmaker @hatsbyhowell as part of our Sarai Bespoke offerings. 

From the classic fedora to colorful straw options for hot summer days, a custom hat is a staple in any discerning closet and a beautiful addition to your tailored garments. 

DM us for more information on how to add a truly unique piece of headwear to your wardrobe.

Handcrafted in Italy by local artisans, these sturdy tote bags are as practical as they are beautiful – these bags have more than enough space to hold all of your day-to-day essentials without sacrificing style at any point.

A hat for every outfit. When designing a custom hat with Sarai Bespoke partner and collaborator @hatsbyhowell, the colour palette is endless. Choose from beautiful felt options such as plum, dusty pink, lilac, sage, cobalt, and slate…to name just a few. 

Then complete your signature hat with unique design details such as vintage bandanas, one-of-a-kind grosgrain ribbons, and even custom scripts. 

DM us for more information on how to design your perfect custom hat.

What is luxury? At Sarai Bespoke, this is a question we ask ourselves routinely. 

And what we’ve come to realize is that true luxury is an experience: slowing down and getting away from the daily grind, or the connections we make while conversing over a coffee or a cocktail. 
 
That’s why we offer our clients a curated respite from their day. When you step into the Sarai Bespoke showroom, high above the hustle and bustle of Vancouver, you’re immediately invited to take a load off, have a conversation, immerse yourself in a creative pursuit, and, of course, enjoy an espresso martini if you wish 🍸☕️👌🏾

*
*
*

Bridging the classic and the contemporary. 
Rooted in both old world craftsmanship and modern sensibility, Style by Sarai is a bespoke lifestyle brand creating tailored garments and empowering our clientele to feel strong and confident in their own personal style. 🇨🇦🇮🇹

*

Timeless sophistication. 

Merging old world craftsmanship with modern sensibility is this stunning velvet jacket made from @aristonimparato fabric. 

Finished with a shawl lapel, slanted pockets, and a single button, this stunning piece can be worn as a tuxedo, or the perfect dinner jacket. 

And for those that want to dress it down, pair it with a black turtleneck and your favorite pair of jeans for the perfect weekend outfit.

The home of bespoke. 

We’re so grateful for the travel opportunities and wonderful connections made with our international clientele and other creatives in the bespoke world. 

It’s always an honour to visit Savile Row to offer our services abroad, and return home inspired by the many artisans that work on tailoring’s most famous street. 

The Sarai Bespoke team looks forward to returning to Savile Row to connect once again with our international community in 2023.

The versatile beauty of a pinstripe suit. 

From the boardroom to a night out at your favourite restaurant, a blue pinstripe suit is perfect for any environment. But that doesn’t mean it can’t be tastefully updated with some modern design elements. 

This custom Sarai Bespoke three-piece pinstripe suit, made from luxurious @gladsonltd fabrics, is elegantly updated with a single button closure to flatter the silhouette, wider peak lapels to add some edge to the jacket, and a double-breasted vest. 

Paired with a light pink shirt with a white contrast collar and cuffs, and a classic purple tie from @dion__1967, to complete the timeless look.
*
*

Arrive in style. 

The philosophy of Style by Sarai has always been to celebrate all facets of a refined lifestyle: timeless garments, world travel, immaculate food, and the sheer beauty of high-end vehicles. 

We’ve been honored to work with amazing lifestyle partners and collaborators in the automotive space to experience this Bentley Bentayga
*
*

#bespokesuits #customsuits #stylebysarai #menswear #styleinspiration #downtownvan #businesswear #businessmen #beyourownstyleicon #bespokehats #tailoring #fitting #stylist #suitup #vancouver

Ever-evolving style. 

Depending on your environment and your personality, what you wear is going to change. The boardroom may call for one piece of clothing, while the patio on sunny sunday may call for another. 

The tie that binds them both, however, is your personal style. The intangible flair you bring to every situation and every garment you wear. It’s your energy. It’s your confidence. It goes beyond clothing – it’s your very way of being. 

It’s that unique style that we strive to support at Sarai Bespoke so you can, truly, be your own style icon.
*
*
*

#bespokesuits #customsuits #stylebysarai #menswear #styleinspiration #downtownvan #businesswear #businessmen #beyourownstyleicon #bespokehats #tailoring #fitting #stylist #suitup

The enduring power of black and white garments. 

Suitable for a trip to southern Italy and a Monday morning meeting, these sharp pieces represent the versatility of simple, clean fabrics. 

On the left is a three-piece @foxbrothers1772Prince of Wales suit, designed with a high-gorge notch lapel and double-breasted vest. This mill dates back more than 250 years and is, truly, the embodiment of classic British tailoring 🇬🇧🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿🦊

On the right is a pristine @caccioppoli1920 white blazer, finished with slanted pockets and one-button construction. Both bring an element of versatility and refinement to even the most discerning closet.
*
*
*

Elevated essentials. 

For the busy professional, few things are as important as your coat and trusty tote bag.

This custom Sarai Bespoke topcoat, made from stunning Prince of Wales @caccioppoli1920 fabric, is finished with contrasting velvet lapels, backband, and buttons. Combining Italian craftsmanship and heritage with a modern aesthetic, this bold topcoat is sure to stand out. 

Pair that with our black-on-black Sarai Bespoke custom tote bags, handmade with leather and suede in Italy, and your on-the-go-outfit definitely makes a statement.

Seeing The Florence Duomo each trip to Firenze reminds me of pursuing your passions in life and to dream big. 

The Renaissance era inspired countless artists, designers, architects, and continues to inspire me and so many people in all walks of life. 

Grateful for my family, SbyS team and SARAI Bespoke clientele, for your on-going support to build a lifestyle brand and exclusive experience 🙏🏾

Your style however must evolve and adapt accordingly to your environment and personality.  Style goes beyond just clothing. It’s your way of being. Your energy. Your confidence. It’s a lifestyle.

"The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page." - Saint Augustine 

Embarking on a journey to Florence is to have the chance to stroll through an open-air museum – where art, history, and culture are intertwined seamlessly. In many ways, it's more than just traveling; it's a lifestyle filled with exquisite experiences – from charming accommodations to delicious cuisine, crafted cocktails, captivating music, and inspiring fashion. 

Immersing myself in the European way of life ignites my creativity and fuels my passion for designing bespoke garments. Florence is where I truly live, breathe, and thrive."

The countdown is on! ⏰ 

Our upcoming Soirée by Sarai event is on July 29, on the 34th floor of the iconic Sheraton Vancouver Wall Centre. It will be a refined evening of cocktails, light tapas, community, and fireworks to celebrate our beautiful city.

And with our soirée just around the corner, we’ve been reflecting on some of our past events. Just one year ago, we took over The Kent and brought together a like-minded group of entrepreneurs, executives, and professionals to enjoy an evening of style, mixology, cuisine, music, and great conversation. It was, truly, a celebration of lifestyle. 

To inquire about our upcoming soirée, please email us at lifestyle@stylebysarai.com and our team will get back to you ASAP.

We’re looking forward to making more memories with the community.

🎥 : @yourstoryagency
Venue: @thekentvan

“The Dimensions of Experiential Luxury”⁣

A throwback to the Vancouver edition of Kohler’s Design Forum, hosted on May 23rd, 2019 at the Vancouver Convention Centre. The theme of the celebrated event was “The Dimensions of Experiential Luxury.” I shared our core values at Style by Sarai & SARAI BESPOKE and how they correspond to fostering genuine relationships, tapping into the inner artist of our clients, pushing the boundaries personally and professionally, learning during our travels, and amalgamating these aspects to deliver uniquely personalized and exclusive experiences. 

The lineup of renowned speakers included President and CEO of Kohler Co., David Kohler; Owner and Principal Designer Khachi Design Group, Ramsin Khachi; Founder of Style by Sarai, Jason Sarai; and KOHLER’s Senior Industrial Designer Erin Lilly, including Bianca Solterbeck as moderator.⁣

It was an incredible day dedicated to the multifaceted practice of design. We were, truly, grateful to take part in it 🙏🏾👌🏾
⁣
@kohler @kssvancouver @ramsinkhachi @biancasolterbeck @stylebysarai

Sipping on history with a classic Sazerac 🥃✨ 

This timeless cocktail, believed to have been created in a French Quarter pharmacy, hails from New Orleans and boasts a mix of Rye Whiskey/Cognac, Peychaud's bitters, simple syrup, and a hint of absinthe for that signature twist. 

Stirred with history, the Sazerac is considered one of the oldest known cocktails. Cheers to a drink of the past! 🍹🎉 

Ingredients: 2 oz. of Cognac | 1/2 oz. Simple Syrup | 3 Dashes of Peychauds Bitters | Absinthe spray to finish

Travel Tuesday: Toronto 🇨🇦

My journey in, and love for, Toronto began back in 2008 as a Wealth Management Advisor at RBC Dominion Securities. As I reflect on those days, I realize those early trips, truly, set the foundation for what was to come. 

Flash forward to 2014, and I was still traveling to Toronto, but the focus had shifted to Style by Sarai consulting and SARAI Bespoke. Since then, the consistent increase in visits over time is a direct result of the warmth and support shown through introductions and referrals from our wonderful clients and community. 

It is a blessing to come back to this wonderful city – I couldn’t be more excited for the continued expansion of our bespoke lifestyle services in Toronto, and throughout the rest of Canada as well. 👔🪡✈️

Sip, savor, repeat. The Espresso Martini offered at the Sarai Bespoke Bar: Vodka, Kahlua, Espresso. 🍸☕👌🏾

The 3 Beans: Health, Wealth, & Happiness

Despite its relatively young age, the Espresso Martini is, without question, a classic. Invented in 1983 by British celebrity bartender Dick Bradsell, the Espresso Martini has gone on to international renown for both its boozy and caffeinated powers.

Ingredients:

2 oz. of Vodka | 1/2 oz. Kahula | 1 oz. Fresh Espresso

Garnish:
3 Espresso Beans

A trip back to Tuscany 🇮🇹🍷

Reflecting on our most recent trip to Florence for Pitti Uomo and the elegant longtable dinner we had the privilege of collaborating with New York-based @nochasermagazine and it’s founder, @guerreisms. 

Dubbed “The Session Part 2,” the event was held at the stunning Valiano Estate in Tuscany and brought together people from across the globe – from Paris, London, and Amsertdam, to name a few – to discuss lifestyle in all its facets. 

It is a blessing to make these incredible connections, forge new relationships, and learn from other professionals in the fashion and lifestyle space. 

Looking forward to returning to Florence in January for the next instalment of Pitti Uomo and to reconnect with our international community.

📷: @komar_photo @katerynakom

Happy 1st Birthday to my son, Javani 🎂❤️🥰🙏🏾

I had the honour of writing a letter to my children for @nochasermagazine while at BC Children’s Hospital a few days after Javani was born on 10/12/22 

Dear Siena and Javani,

But, like everything in life, there was a silver lining to this challenging period: your mother and I were able to rethink our work schedules, reimagine our priorities, and stay home more often to watch you both grow. What a blessing it has been to realign our lives to better serve our family.

You both, along with your mother and I, are blessed to be surrounded by a big family of grandparents, uncles, aunts, cousins, and dear friends that care for you. Their love, wisdom, and sacrifice have shaped our family for decades, and will continue to mold us as we grow together. 

Siena and Javani: you come from a long line of brave, compassionate, and hard working people. Your grandparents and great grandparents moved across the world, to a place they’d never been and didn’t speak the language, to give us all a better life. I think about their experience often – how hard it must have been to leave loved ones behind and start fresh in a new land. 

It has been the inspiration that has fuelled my life and it is my hope that their sacrifice will continue to serve as motivation for you to live life to the fullest, discover your passions, be creative, and make your community a better place. I’ve been so lucky to build a career at Sarai Bespoke that has enriched me with those things. But now that I get to share it with you, I realize how much you both are a part of that creativity as well. I learn from you each and every day; we’re in this together, building as a team, forging a legacy we can all be proud of. There is truly nothing more important to me, no higher calling, than to help you both along your journey, just as you’ve helped me on mine.

There will be ups and downs, of course, and you’ll make some mistakes along the way. But don’t worry too much about it, it’s what makes life interesting. And I’ll be right there beside you offering my love, guidance, and support at every step. 

There’s nowhere else I’d rather be. 

With all my love,

Dad

SARAI Bespoke

#beyourownstyleicon

“The journey, not the arrival, matters” – T.S. Eliot

It has been a year of amazing travel experiences: returning to Florence twice for the acclaimed menswear conference Pitti Uomo, expanding our bespoke offerings and lifestyle services in cities such as Miami, Toronto, and Edmonton, as well as attending destination weddings in stunning locations like Puglia and Tokyo to celebrate the unions of dear friends and clients. ✈️🥂🎉👌🏾

That SARAI Bespoke has been the catalyst for these adventures is not lost on me – I am grateful for each and every opportunity creating garments for our community has brought.🙏🏾

The chance to see the world has also reinforced a valuable lesson: to keep going, to keep dreaming big, and to continually strive to improve our bespoke experience. It is the pursuit of excellence that is the goal, not the arrival. There is always another level to hit, just as there is always another place to see. 

I’m excited to see where 2024 takes us!🥂

Recently, I had the opportunity to sit down with Thane Stenner of Stenner Wealth Partners on his BNN Bloomberg Smart Wealth Podcast. It was an honour to share our journey with Thane and his audience; we covered everything from the birth of SARAI Bespoke to what it’s like working in the always-changing lifestyle space.

We also discussed the importance of hope, focus, and doubling down on your strengths – all key pillars to serving, and growing, a dedicated community. Click the video to check out more from our wide-ranging conversation. 📽️🎙️

Thrilled to share the SARAI Bespoke journey with Helen Siwak for the latest edition of Portfolio.YVR @folio.yvr, a publication celebrating luxury lifestyle offerings in our amazing city!

Seeing our bespoke story in print always reminds me of how far we’ve come: from a 110-square foot showroom years ago, to a company with two dedicated spaces totalling more than 1,500 square feet and clients across the world. 

And we’re just getting started! 🙏🏾👌🏾🥂

Feeling thankful and inspired after another memorable and productive trip to Florence, Italy, where we attended Pitti Uomo 105 – the renowned menswear conference featuring the world’s top sartorial trends and designs. 🇮🇹🇬🇧👌🏾

This trip marked the 12th time since 2016 that we’ve attended as a company and it was, by far, the most impactful Pitti Uomo to date. 

We met with leaders from our amazing fabric partners and are coordinating multiple trunk shows to be hosted at our SARAI Bespoke showroom throughout the year. Stay tuned for more details on these exclusive events coming very soon. 

We also established new relationships to begin offering SARAI Bespoke vests and outerwear garments, spent time with global experts to share best practices in the world of craftsmanship and style, and took in new trend forecasts for 2024 - 2025 that included some beautiful peach, pink, and purples shades, as well as the continuation of strong earth tones as we’ve been seeing in recent seasons. 

Excited to share these new, inspiring offerings in upcoming bespoke consultations with our community in Vancouver and beyond! 🥂👌🏾
